# dash-grid



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                           | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `colL`   | `col-l`   | Number of columns when the screen size is large       | `number` | `undefined` |
| `colM`   | `col-m`   | Number of columns when the screen size is medium      | `number` | `undefined` |
| `colS`   | `col-s`   | Number of columns when the screen size is small       | `number` | `undefined` |
| `colXl`  | `col-xl`  | Number of columns when the screen size is extra large | `number` | `undefined` |
